thread.title: Australian Mining Sector’s Future Is Still Bright, Resources Minister Says
thread.title_full: Australian Mining Sector’s Future Is Still Bright, Resources Minister Says - WSJ

author: Rob Taylor
title: Australian Mining Sector’s Future Is Still Bright, Resources Minister Says
text:
CANBERRA, Australia—Australia’s new resources minister says he is upbeat about the future of the country’s mining sector, despite slumping resource prices and accelerating efforts among major nations, including China, to combat climate change by curbing fossil-fuel emissions.
Josh Frydenberg, appointed resources and energy minister by Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull in a cabinet shake-up last week, said he was confident there would... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
